import React from 'react';
import { Text, View } from 'react-native';
import { heightPercentageToDP as hp } from 'react-native-responsive-screen';
import { mowColors } from '../../values/Colors/MowColors';

export const TrackOrder = ({ data }): React.ReactElement => {
    return (

        <View style={{
            marginTop: 16,
            marginBottom: 16,
        }}>
            {
                data === 'canceled' ?
                    <View
                        style={{ flexDirection: 'row', height: hp('0%') }}>
                        <View
                            style={{ flex: 1, alignItems: 'center', marginTop: 5 }}>
                            <View
                                style={{
                                    width: hp('2%'),
                                    height: hp('2%'),
                                    backgroundColor: data === 'canceled' ? mowColors.mainColor : '#b6babe',
                                    borderRadius: 100,
                                }} />

                            <View
                                style={{
                                    height: '100%',
                                    width: 2,
                                    backgroundColor: '#b6babe',
                                }} />

                        </View>

                        <View
                            style={{ flex: 5, paddingBottom: 10 }}>
                            <Text
                                style={{
                                    fontSize: hp('1.8'),
                                    fontWeight: 'bold',
                                    fontStyle: 'normal',
                                    letterSpacing: 0,
                                    textAlign: 'left',
                                    color: mowColors.titleTextColor,
                                    marginBottom: 3
                                }}>
                                Canceled
                        </Text>
                        </View>
                    </View> :
                    <View>
                        <View
                            style={{ flexDirection: 'row', height: hp('5%') }}>
                            <View
                                style={{ flex: 1, alignItems: 'center', marginTop: 5 }}>
                                <View
                                    style={{
                                        width: hp('2%'),
                                        height: hp('2%'),
                                        backgroundColor: data === 'pending' ? mowColors.mainColor : '#b6babe',
                                        borderRadius: 100,
                                    }} />

                                <View
                                    style={{
                                        height: '100%',
                                        width: 2,
                                        backgroundColor: '#b6babe',
                                    }} />

                            </View>

                            <View
                                style={{ flex: 5, paddingBottom: 10 }}>
                                <Text
                                    style={{
                                        fontSize: hp('1.8'),
                                        fontWeight: 'bold',
                                        fontStyle: 'normal',
                                        letterSpacing: 0,
                                        textAlign: 'left',
                                        color: mowColors.titleTextColor,
                                        marginBottom: 3
                                    }}>
                                    Pending
                        </Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                        <View
                            style={{ flexDirection: 'row', height: hp('5%') }}>
                            <View
                                style={{ flex: 1, alignItems: 'center', marginTop: 5 }}>
                                <View
                                    style={{
                                        width: hp('2%'),
                                        height: hp('2%'),
                                        backgroundColor: data === 'processing' ? mowColors.mainColor : '#b6babe',
                                        borderRadius: 100,
                                    }} />

                                <View
                                    style={{
                                        height: '100%',
                                        width: 2,
                                        backgroundColor: '#b6babe',
                                    }} />

                            </View>

                            <View
                                style={{ flex: 5, paddingBottom: 10 }}>
                                <Text
                                    style={{
                                        fontSize: hp('1.8'),
                                        fontWeight: 'bold',
                                        fontStyle: 'normal',
                                        letterSpacing: 0,
                                        textAlign: 'left',
                                        color: mowColors.titleTextColor,
                                        marginBottom: 3
                                    }}>
                                    Processing
                        </Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>

                        <View
                            style={{ flexDirection: 'row', height: hp('5%') }}>
                            <View
                                style={{ flex: 1, alignItems: 'center', marginTop: 5 }}>
                                <View
                                    style={{
                                        width: hp('2%'),
                                        height: hp('2%'),
                                        backgroundColor: data === 'onway' ? mowColors.mainColor : '#b6babe',
                                        borderRadius: 100,
                                    }} />

                                <View
                                    style={{
                                        height: '100%',
                                        width: 2,
                                        backgroundColor: '#b6babe',
                                    }} />

                            </View>

                            <View
                                style={{ flex: 5, paddingBottom: 10 }}>
                                <Text
                                    style={{
                                        fontSize: hp('1.8'),
                                        fontWeight: 'bold',
                                        fontStyle: 'normal',
                                        letterSpacing: 0,
                                        textAlign: 'left',
                                        color: mowColors.titleTextColor,
                                        marginBottom: 3
                                    }}>
                                    On Way
                        </Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>

                        <View
                            style={{ flexDirection: 'row', height: hp('5%') }}>
                            <View
                                style={{ flex: 1, alignItems: 'center', marginTop: 5 }}>
                                <View
                                    style={{
                                        width: hp('2%'),
                                        height: hp('2%'),
                                        backgroundColor: data === 'delivered' ? mowColors.mainColor : '#b6babe',
                                        borderRadius: 100,
                                    }} />

                                <View
                                    style={{
                                        height: '100%',
                                        width: 2,
                                        backgroundColor: '#b6babe',
                                    }} />

                            </View>

                            <View
                                style={{ flex: 5, paddingBottom: 10 }}>
                                <Text
                                    style={{
                                        fontSize: hp('1.8'),
                                        fontWeight: 'bold',
                                        fontStyle: 'normal',
                                        letterSpacing: 0,
                                        textAlign: 'left',
                                        color: mowColors.titleTextColor,
                                        marginBottom: 3
                                    }}>
                                    Delivered
                        </Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>

                        <View
                            style={{ flexDirection: 'row', height: hp('0%') }}>
                            <View
                                style={{ flex: 1, alignItems: 'center', marginTop: 5 }}>
                                <View
                                    style={{
                                        width: hp('2%'),
                                        height: hp('2%'),
                                        backgroundColor: data === 'returned' ? mowColors.mainColor : '#b6babe',
                                        borderRadius: 100,
                                    }} />

                                <View
                                    style={{
                                        height: '100%',
                                        width: 2,
                                        backgroundColor: '#b6babe',
                                    }} />

                            </View>

                            <View
                                style={{ flex: 5, paddingBottom: 10 }}>
                                <Text
                                    style={{
                                        fontSize: hp('1.8'),
                                        fontWeight: 'bold',
                                        fontStyle: 'normal',
                                        letterSpacing: 0,
                                        textAlign: 'left',
                                        color: mowColors.titleTextColor,
                                        marginBottom: 3
                                    }}>
                                    Returned
                        </Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                    </View>

            }
        </View>

    );
}
